verbose_text: Unexpectedly, pertussis toxin (PTX) (200 ng/mL), a G alphai inhibitor, did not block the inhibitory effect of U-50,488 (XREF_FIG), suggesting that a G alphai -independent pathway is involved in spinal KOR activation mediated itch inhibition.
evidence: PTX) (200 ng/mL), a G alphai  inhibitor, did not block the inhibitory effect of U-50,488
